content.text: Hello! I'm good, just finished writing my latest book.
That's awesome! What kind of book did you write?
That sounds interesting. I'm not much of a reader, but I like romantic suspense movies.
I love reading and writing romantic suspense novels. I'm a veteran, and I love writing about strong female characters who overcome adversity.
That's really cool! I love strong female characters. I'm a teacher, and I love teaching English.
That's great! I love learning new things. I'm always reading about different cultures and history.
Me too! I love to travel, and I love learning about different cultures.
That's awesome! I've never been out of the country, but I'd love to travel someday.
You should! It's an amazing experience. I've been to Europe and Asia, and I've had so much fun.
That sounds amazing! I'll definitely have to put that on my bucket list.
Great! I hope you get to go soon
